author: lennon.m
title: Africans acquiring ADA through USSD
description: Over 50% of Africans still use non-smart phones. However, most crypto exchanges in Africa are only accessible through smart devices.
solution: We have built one of the first USSD-based crypto platforms that enables Africans to buy, sell, send, invest, and borrow in crypto/ADA.
experience: We have developed two enterprise scale blockchain-based solutions that are currently deployed at National level tackling identity challenges
